Rotation.RotationList: -- defensive spells --|Pick Lock|Apply Poisons|Stealth|Assist Tank|Tricks of the Trade|Fan of Knives|-- offensive spells --|Garrote|Backstab|Slice and Dice|Rupture|Vanish|Cold Blood|Gloves|Trinket1|Trinket 2|Vendetta|Envenom|Mutilate
Rotation.RotationNotes:
Tap RIGHT CONTROL to disable/enable Backstab/Garrotte Hold down LEFT ALT pause rotation Hold down LEFT SHIFT to use Fan of Knives
-- Features Auto Pick Lock when any player trade you a Lockbox Auto apply poisons
